import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '@auth0/auth0-angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navigation', templateUrl: './navigation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navigation.component.scss'] }) export class NavigationComponent implements OnInit { user: any = null constructor(public auth:AuthService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.auth.getUser } }
